title: Ascent from binary cache not fixing path correctly, can cause runtime failure

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

With access to summit, this can be reproduced using workflow in https://github.com/cinemascienceworkflows/2020-10_Nyx . I can help with running this if needed.

```console
$ git clone https://github.com/cinemascienceworkflows/2020-10_Nyx.git
$ cd 2020-10_Nyx
$ vi bootstrap.env # Set WarningNotSet to appropriate variables
$ ./execute
```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->
The workflow pulls ascent and its dependencies from E4S cache, then builds Nyx using that ascent. The Nyx build is successful, but fails at runtime with: 
```console
$ vi <install_location>/pantheon/ECP-Examples_Nyx-002/results/Nyx64_Test.744775
...
[Error] Ascent::execute
file: /tmp/lpeyrala/spack-stage/spack-stage-ascent-0.6.0-bpoqtmc5f6kjhxeto2e6xqynicfrorpr/spack-src/src/ascent/utils/ascent_web_interface.cpp
line: 100
message:
Web client root directory (/dev/shm/pantheon-spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholde/linux-rhel7-power9le/gcc-6.4.0/ascent-0.6.0-bpoqtmc5f6kjhxeto2e6xqynicfrorpr/share/ascent/web_clients)  is missing

User defined signal 2
```

I could be wrong, but I think the problem is this path:
`/dev/shm/pantheon-spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholde/linux-rhel7-power9le/gcc-6.4.0/ascent-0.6.0-bpoqtmc5f6kjhxeto2e6xqynicfrorpr/share/ascent/web_clients`

Isn't being rewritten to the correct path, which for me would be:
`/gpfs/alpine/csc420/scratch/stam/pantheon/ECP-Examples_Nyx-002/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power9le/gcc-6.4.0/ascent-0.6.0-bpoqtmc5f6kjhxeto2e6xqynicfrorpr/share/ascent/web_clients`

### Information on your system

```console
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-6-676d68a
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-power9le
```
